"Sharing Your Fashion":
"The Fashion Catalog is a social catalog of other player's fashion.

You can share your own fashion with other players by selecting \"Register Your Fashion\". You can also view other people's fashion by selecting \"View Everyone's Fashion\" and send them a \"Like!\" on their fashion preview if you liked their fashion.

You can see your own \"Likes\" that were sent to you from the \"Communication History\" menu.

So don't delay, view the \"Fashion Catalog\" today!"
